                                               {
                G4Region* region = aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex()->GetRegion();
                if (regions_.find(region->GetName()) != regions_.end()) {
                    return regionSave_[region->GetName()];
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            }
